title: Ticket #499: Add a DAGMan test for "confusing" log file paths
description: We should have a DAG test where several different node jobs point to the same actual log file via different paths (with paths that don't resolve to the same thing even when made absolute). Use '..', maybe symlinks, anything else we can think of. I want to do this as part of the "lazy log file" implementation.
remarks:
Okay, I've added a test for this (job_dagman_log_path), but I'm not resolving the ticket yet because I haven't pushed my repository to the main repository.

I've now pushed this to the repository.
